subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Since he was recalled from the minors on July 12, Lastings Milledge has driven in a team-high 11 runs, and — until Tuesday night — done nothing to spark the controversy.
snippet: Since he was recalled from the minors on July 12, Lastings Milledge has driven in a team-high 11 runs, and — until Tuesday night — done nothing to spark the controversy.
